attributes.action: use empty shops for family dwellings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: with the ustoppable rise in supermarkets thousands of small shops that where once family houses are now stood empty around the country - could grants / taxation be available to allow ailing shops to redevelop back to a family house before that shop goes bust completely and for development grants to be available for developers and housing authorities to buy and redevelop shops that have often stood empty for a great many years back to family housing- this would bring a great many buildings back into the housing market
